stat.cpp
00001 /*******************************************************************************
00002  *  instruction.cpp
00003  *  Instruction object. Each instruction is placed into the instruction window for
00004  *  issue and then removed from the window when commited.
00005  ******************************************************************************/
00006 #include <stdio.h>
00007 #include "instruction.h"
00008 
00009 instruction::instruction() {
00010         _insType   = noType;
00011         _insStatus = noStatus;
00012         _readORwrite = none;
00013 
00014         _r  = new List<int*>;
00015         _rt = new List<int*>;
00016         _memAddr = 0;
00017         
00018         _issueCycle  = -1;
00019         _latency     = -1;
00020         _completeCycle = -1;
00021 }
00022 
00023 void instruction::setMemAddr(uint64_t memAddr) {
00024         _memAddr = memAddr;
00025         //if (debug) printf("addr = %lx\n", _memAddr);
00026 }
00027 
00028 void instruction::setRegister ( int *r, int *rt) {
00029         //Assert(r1 != 0 && r2 != 0 && r3 != 0); //TODO double check this
00030         (_r)->Append(r);
00031         (_rt)->Append(rt);
00032         //if (debug) printf("reg = %d, type = %d\n", *r, *rt);
00033 }
00034 
00035 void instruction::setType (type insType) {
00036         //Assert(insType != NULL);
00037         _insType = insType;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void instruction::setStatus (status insStatus, 
00041                             int cycle, 
00042                             int latency) {
00043         //Assert(insStatus != NULL);
00044         _insStatus = insStatus;
00045         if (_insStatus == issue) {
00046                 _issueCycle  = cycle;
00047                 _latency     = latency;
00048                 _completeCycle = cycle + latency;
00049         }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void instruction::setMemType (memType readORwrite) {
00053         _readORwrite = readORwrite;
00054 }
00055 type instruction::getType () {
00056         return _insType;
00057 }
00058 
00059 status instruction::getStatus () {
00060         return _insStatus;
00061 }
00062 
00063 int instruction::getLatency() {
00064         return _latency;
00065 }
00066 
00067 int instruction::getCompleteCycle() {
00068         return _completeCycle;
00069 }
00070 
00071 int instruction::getIssueCycle() {
00072         return _issueCycle;
00073 }
00074 
00075 int instruction::getMyReg (int i) {
00076         //Assert (i >= 0 && i < _r->NumElements());
00077         return *_r->Nth(i);
00078 }
00079 
00080 uint64_t instruction::getMemAddr() {
00081         return _memAddr;
00082 }
00083 
00084 memType instruction::getMemType() {
00085         return _readORwrite;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 int instruction::getNumReg() {
00090         //Assert (_r->NumElements() == _rt->NumElements());
00091         return _r->NumElements();
00092 }
00093 
00094 int instruction::getMyRegType(int i) {
00095         //Assert (i >= 0 && i < _rt->NumElements());
00096         return *_rt->Nth(i);
00097 }
